issue.title: [R] Use centos-7 binary on Linux if curl/openssl not found
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16985](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16985). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Followup to ARROW-16752. This should work; we'll need to add an env var to control whether r_docker_configure.sh installs curl/openssl to test this.
